channel.title: Features on titef
channel.description: Recent content in Features on titef

item.title: Easy migration
item.description: Exposing the same API as the most popular testing framework, you can migrate your projects to Titef now and with no effort

item.title: Human friendly
item.description: Lots of documentation, examples and recipes make your life easier when it’s time to embrace Titef, either as contributor or as user

item.title: Lightning fast
item.description: Being faster than Mocha and two times faster than Jest and Ava, Titef with its ~2.9Kb (gzipped) of total weight is ready to amaze you.
